name: Happiness
description:
Project focuses on storytelling, rather than gameplay. Since it started as a Game Jam mini-project, it can be polished later on. The total length of version 0.0.0 is around 5-8 minutes including 1 minute of narrative.

The game, Happiness, is a 2D platformer adventure game with simple left and right movement & jump. The game starts with a story narrative, it has 3 levels of fun.

Main character Luana is controlled by the player. Starts with the background of Luana, and game levels are designed to achieve Luana's goal of saving her sister.
